name: Garden Mayhem
description:
Overcooked inspired gardening game where you must tend to the needs of your plants to keep them alive. Made for Ludum Dare 46.

Controls

Mouse - Steer Character

WASD - Movement

E / Left Click - Pickup

Q / Right Click - Drop

Planting Seeds
Seeds are planted in pots. These pot must be placed on a counter in the shed.
Seeds can be purchased from the store, but the first packs free.
Once a seed is planted it will begin to have needs.

Needs
Seeds have needs to fulfill these the player must colect the reqired items from around the garden.
They are indicated by there icons.

Selling
Once a plant is fully grown a tick will appear below it.
This can now be taken to the sales counter indicated by a dollar sign.
